servinfo.title: Crankshaft Position (CKP) Sensor Removal and Installation

s1.ptxt: Remove transmission assembly from vehicle referring to Automatic Transmission Assembly Dismounting and Remounting:4 A/T or Manual Transmission Assembly Dismounting and Remounting:Petrol Engine Model .
Remove drive plate or flywheel from crankshaft.
Disconnect connector from crankshaft position sensor.
Remove crankshaft position sensor (1) from cylinder block (2).

topic.title: Installation

ptxt.intxrefpoff: Crankshaft Position (CKP) Sensor Inspection:M16A and J20A

topic.ptxt: Reverse removal procedure noting the following.

item.ptxt: Apply engine oil to O-ring of sensor.
Tighten CKP sensor bolt to specified torque.
Connect connector and fix wire harness with clamp securely.

s1.ptxt: Remove generator drive belt, loosen pivot bolt and move generator outward.
Disconnect connector from crankshaft position sensor.
Remove crankshaft position sensor (1) from cylinder block.

ptxt.intxrefpoff: Crankshaft Position (CKP) Sensor Inspection:M16A and J20A

s1.ptxt: Install crankshaft position sensor to cylinder block. Tighten CKP sensor bolt to specified torque.
Connect connector to CKP sensor securely.
Adjust generator drive belt tension referring to Water Pump and Generator Drive Belt Tension Inspection and Adjustment (M16A):M16A and J20A .
